title: Scene of Outer Space
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Circular form; decorated with earth, stars, moon, and planets against a dark blue background; orbiting around the earth, a small red sphere (Sputnik); thin gilded band around outer edge.
name: Plate
